title: The Fight Over Banning the AR-15
description:
Many of the deadliest mass shootings in the U.S. have involved an assault-style rifle like the AR-15. WSJ’s Zusha Elinson reports on how Washington regulations have failed to stop the gun's rise to prominence.

Further Reading:
America’s Failed Attempt to Ban Assault Weapons 

Further Listening: 
Red-Flag Laws, Their Application and One Mother’s Experience
